name: cerdas
description: Self-hosted, offline-first, no-code app builder for data collection

scripts.version:patch: cd apps/client && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && node scripts/sync-version.mjs
scripts.version:minor: cd apps/client && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && node scripts/sync-version.mjs
scripts.version:major: cd apps/client && npm version major --no-git-tag-version && cd ../.. && node scripts/sync-version.mjs
